title: rerun --script COMMIT seems to record script for the wrong commit
body:
```shell
$> datalad run bash -c 'date >| datefile'
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
add(ok): datefile (file)                                                                                               
save(ok): . (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (notneeded: 1, ok: 1)

$> datalad rerun --script HEAD
run(ok): HEAD (dataset) [Script written to HEAD]

$> cat HEAD 
#!/bin/sh
#
# This file was generated by running (the equivalent of)
#
#   datalad rerun --script=HEAD cdadfc311bd8bc72381254f19e5eb35c753c6354
#
# in dataset 7de894c4-778d-11e9-a650-8019340ce7f2 at /tmp/testds


# (record: cdadfc311bd8bc72381254f19e5eb35c753c6354)
bash -c 'date >| datefile'
```
so it is ok here, but then if I add one more commit and point to the previous (in original usecase I pointed by hexsha):

```
$> rm HEAD

$> echo 123 > 123

$> datalad add -m 'another one' 123
add(ok): /tmp/testds/123 (file)
save(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)

$> datalad rerun --script HEAD^    
run(ok): HEAD^ (dataset) [Script written to HEAD^]

$> cat HEAD\^ 
#!/bin/sh
#
# This file was generated by running (the equivalent of)
#
#   datalad rerun --script=HEAD^ dc2f7f48ca4607741ee5fad5ca05a82a4be8aa8b
#
# in dataset 7de894c4-778d-11e9-a650-8019340ce7f2 at /tmp/testds
```
so - picked the HEAD
```
$> git lg HEAD^^..
* dc2f7f4 - (HEAD -> master) another one (62 seconds ago) [Yaroslav Halchenko]
* cdadfc3 - [DATALAD RUNCMD] bash -c 'date >| datefile' (2 minutes ago) [Yaroslav Halchenko]
```

but reruns it ok
```shell
$> datalad rerun HEAD^           
unlock(ok): datefile (file)
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
add(ok): datefile (file)                                                                                               
save(ok): . (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (notneeded: 1, ok: 1)
  unlock (ok: 1)

$> git lg
* 3e488fb - (HEAD -> master) [DATALAD RUNCMD] bash -c 'date >| datefile' (4 seconds ago) [Yaroslav Halchenko]
* dc2f7f4 - another one (7 minutes ago) [Yaroslav Halchenko]
* cdadfc3 - [DATALAD RUNCMD] bash -c 'date >| datefile' (8 minutes ago) [Yaroslav Halchenko]
```
